insert into resourse (resourse_name, father_id, url, `level`, `type`) values (#{resourseName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fatherId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{level,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{type,jdbcType=TINYINT})
mapper.update: update resourse set resourse_name = #{resourseName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, father_id = #{fatherId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, url = #{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, `level` = #{level,jdbcType=TINYINT}, `type` = #{type,jdbcType=TINYINT} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select id, resourse_name, father_id, url, `level`, `type` from resourse
